name: Seed Boy (HTX Games)
description:
This game was created during the 10th Game Boy Jam! The main theme for this jam is "plants".

Features

-  You can´t jump. You have to sow plants to climb to upper platforms.

- Like in Super Mario Bros. 2 (or Doki Doki Panic) you can throw vegetables to defeat your enemies.

- Game Boy style, only four colours!

Controlls

ENTER - start the game

A   S  - walk left and right

W - climb up the plants

J - sow plants

K - grab and throw vegetables
